section.title: Our Research Team
section.subtitle: Meet Our Team
section.description: Meet our dedicated team of researchers, faculty members, and graduate students who are pushing the boundaries of empathic computing technology.
section.hero_description: Meet the brilliant minds behind groundbreaking research in empathic computing, AI emotion recognition, and human-computer interaction.

team_members.name: Prof. Mark Billinghurst
team_members.title: Director & Founder
team_members.description: Leading pioneer in empathic computing research with over 500 publications in AR/VR and HCI.

team_members.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
team_members.title: Senior Researcher
team_members.description: Expert in AI emotion recognition and machine learning applications for empathic systems.

team_members.name: Dr. James Rodriguez
team_members.title: VR Research Lead
team_members.description: Specializes in immersive virtual environments and therapeutic VR applications.

team_members.name: Dr. Emily Watson
team_members.title: Psychology Researcher
team_members.description: Bridges psychology and technology to understand human emotional responses to computing systems.

team_members.name: Dr. Michael Kim
team_members.title: AI Systems Developer
team_members.description: Develops cutting-edge AI algorithms for real-time emotion recognition and response systems.

team_members.name: Dr. Lisa Thompson
team_members.title: UX Research Director
team_members.description: Focuses on human-centered design for empathic computing interfaces and user experience.

team_members.name: Dr. Alex Patel
team_members.title: Collaborative Systems Lead
team_members.description: Researches collaborative interfaces that facilitate empathic communication between users.

team_members.name: Dr. Rachel Green
team_members.title: Graduate Program Coordinator
team_members.description: Mentors PhD and Masters students in empathic computing research methodologies.
